column17:
Crafted from faux leather these bellies from Puma feature an embossed detail. They are slim lightweight and help increase blood circulation around the feet. The elasticated detail and the cushioned footbed ensure maximum comfort.

Features
  • Material: Faux Leather
  • Colour: Black
  • Style: Round toe
  • Detailing: Embossed detail
  • Lining: Smooth synthetic lining
  • Footbed: Cushioned

Style it up with a pair of jeans for a smart look.

Care Tip
Use a gentle cleaner and then apply a protective gel or conditioner to protect it from the elements.
